meanings.definition: A representation or imitation of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The wax figure in the museum is a simulacrum of the famous actor.
meanings.sent2: The portrait hanging on the wall is a simulacrum of the queen.
meanings.sent3: The child made a simulacrum of their favorite superhero out of clay.
meanings.sent4: The hologram projected on stage was a simulacrum of the deceased singer.
meanings.sent5: The robot was designed to be a perfect simulacrum of a human being.
